snippet: The swing-state campaign from the conservative Americans for Prosperity, financed by the Koch brothers, shows the power in this election of a small number of wealthy donors.
abstract: The swing-state campaign from the conservative Americans for Prosperity, financed by the Koch brothers, shows the power in this election of a small number of wealthy donors.

headline.main: Americans for Prosperity Begins $25 Million Anti-Obama Ad Campaign
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: A Direct Hit at the President
